body_html: I had a similar problem and this fixes it for me too. I'm a bit puzzled though, as I had previously called tf.initialize_all_variables().run(session=sess) but that did not work on its own. I actually had to call initialize_local_variables() as well. Shouldn't the former subsume the latter?
body_text: I had a similar problem and this fixes it for me too. I'm a bit puzzled though, as I had previously called tf.initialize_all_variables().run(session=sess) but that did not work on its own. I actually had to call initialize_local_variables() as well. Shouldn't the former subsume the latter?
body: I had a similar problem and this fixes it for me too. I'm a bit puzzled though, as I had previously called `tf.initialize_all_variables().run(session=sess)` but that did not work on its own. I actually had to call `initialize_local_variables()` as well. Shouldn't the former subsume the latter?
